TLDR:My first post will be here

I plan to end every post with a shoutout to @iamtrask. His book provided the inspiration to write a blog. I highly recommend it and I have no financial incentive to say this! He explains concepts clearly, and then he shows you how to implement them in raw numpy, which gives you a much better understanding than using the high-level frameworks!
